message.raw:
Unconditionally convery h5_file paths to network agnostic when sending
to workers. Have a method in the worker convert them to local again
before calling the worker's transition_to_buffered().

Since shared_drive.path_to_local is idempotent, this is backward compatible
with devices that convert the path to local manually.
